questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no The image does not depict any character aura grading.
no The image is not cropped to the size of a real card; it appears larger and more detailed than standard card dimensions.
no The label at the top has the text 'Trollbeads Halloween Hoe Waltz', not 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no Since 'GNRLYXYZ' is not present, '1/1' is not displayed directly below it.
no There is no barcode beneath '1/1' because '1/1' is not present in the image.
no There is no grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top.
no There is no numeric grade displayed below a non-existent grade label.
no There is no certification number displayed below a non-existent numeric grade.
no The text on the label includes varying sizes, such as the small fine print details compared to the larger title text.
no The padding from the border for all text is not consistent, with some areas having more spacing than others.
yes The display is placed on a white background.
no The full display is not shown without any text or labels on the card; several texts and labels are visible.
